snippet.title: Super Cat | Nat Geo Wild
snippet.description: Take Kobe Bryant's ability to jump, add Michelle Kwan's grace and beauty, then mix well with Stephen Hawking's problem-solving genius -- and you've got the recipe for Super Cat.
